name: TimeShift
summary: TimeShift is a 2007 first-person shooter developed by Saber Interactive and published by Sierra Entertainment for Microsoft Windows, Xbox 360, and PlayStation 3. The key feature of TimeShift is the player's ability to control time: slowing, stopping or even rewinding time more or less at will.
